abstract: kentavious caldwell-pope playing with lakers despite 25-day jail sentence .
article: despite serving a 25-day jail sentence for violating his probation , kentavious caldwell-pope wo n't miss much time on the court . according to the los angeles times , the lakers guard will be permitted to leave the seal beach police department detention center for practices and games under a work-release program . while still a member of the pistons , caldwell-pope was charged with operating a vehicle under the influence in suburban detroit in the early morning hours of march 29 . he later pleaded guilty to a lesser misdemeanor charge of allowing a person to drive under the influence .

after he failed to comply with a michigan court 's drug and alcohol screening order , caldwell-pope entered a 25-day program last week that requires him to remain in the state of california during that time under terms of the plea agreement . caldwell-pope will be forced to sit out three upcoming games , two in houston and one in minneapolis , after missing thursday 's game in cleveland , but is expected to suit up for friday 's road game against the warriors . caldwell-pope , 24 , was selected by the pistons with the eighth overall pick in the 2013 nba draft and spent the first four seasons of his career in detroit before signing a one-year deal worth $ 18 million with the lakers in the offseason .
he is averaging 14.2 points and 4.9 rebounds per game this season .
